meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of alchemy.
meanings.sent1: The old book had an alchemistic symbol on its cover.
meanings.sent2: Her alchemistic experiments often involved mixing various substances.
meanings.sent3: The alchemistic potion turned out to be just colored water.
meanings.sent4: His words had an alchemistic effect on her, transforming her mood instantly.
meanings.sent5: The alchemistic process of turning lead into gold fascinated many.

meanings.sent1: The alchemistic master spent years perfecting his craft.
meanings.sent2: She was considered the most alchemistic scholar in the kingdom.
meanings.sent3: The alchemistic wizard's spells always had unexpected results.
meanings.sent4: His alchemistic abilities seemed like magic to the villagers.
meanings.sent5: The alchemistic alchemist could transmute metals with ease.
